entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Brooks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brooks 07:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -15.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -18.7°C
Wind: ENE 21 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow early this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19.
